import './pages.css' import pic5 from "./images/5.jpeg"; import FormControl from '@mui/material/FormControl'; import history from 'history'; import React, { useEffect } from 'react'; export default function ContactUs(){ useEffect(() => { window.scrollTo(0, 0); // Scroll to the top history.scrollRestoration = "manual"; // Prevent browser from restoring scroll position }, []); // Empty dependency array to run the effect only once on component mount return (
